youAreOutside: You are Outside the Story (you do NOT know the secret).
votingInstruction: Each player votes who they think is the Outsider.
questionIntroInstruction: Each person will ask another person a question related to the topic. Press next to see who asks who.
askerToAskeeInstruction: {asker}, ask {askee} a question about the topic! Choose your question carefully so the Outsider doesn't figure it out.
outsiderCaughtButGuessed: You were caught! But you guessed the story ({secret}), well done!
insidersWin: The Insiders win! The story was ({secret}).
outsiderWins: {player} fooled you all! They were the Outsider.
pressNextToSeeRole: Press next to see if you are in or out of the story. Don't let anyone else see the screen!
youAreTheOutsider: You are the Outsider! Try to figure out what the story is from the others' conversation or convince them to vote for the wrong person! Hint: The story is about {category}
youAreAnInsider: You are an Insider! The story is {secret}. Your goal is to find out who among you is the Outsider.
roundEndInstruction: You can continue playing, change players, or go back to the category selection screen.
notEnoughWords: Not enough words for this category.
passDeviceAndVote: Pass the device to {player} to vote.
